name: Douglas County Museum
description: Explore the rich history of Douglas County with exhibits on pioneer life and local industries.

name: Stewart Park
description: A family-friendly park with playgrounds, picnic areas, and walking trails along the river.

name: Umpqua River Lighthouse
description: Historic lighthouse offering stunning views and insights into maritime history, near Roseburg.

name: Wildlife Safari
description: Drive-through safari featuring exotic animals and educational programs for all ages.

name: North Umpqua Trail
description: A scenic hiking trail offering breathtaking views of the North Umpqua River and surrounding forests.

name: North Umpqua River
description: A scenic river known for fishing, rafting, and beautiful natural landscapes.

name: Douglas County Fairgrounds
description: Host to the annual Douglas County Fair and various community events throughout the year.

name: Crater Lake National Park
description: A stunning national park known for its deep blue lake and scenic hiking trails.
